import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ReactiveFormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { PrimeNGConfig } from 'primeng/api'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'], }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { jsonData = ''; apiResponse = ''; [x: string]: any; } onSubmit() { let data; if (this.selectedFormType === 'cuenta') { data = this.cuentaForm.value; } else if (this.selectedFormType === 'transaccion') { data = this.transaccionForm.value; } // Aquí, enviar 'data' a tu servicio API... } ngOnInit() { this.primengConfig.ripple = true; } }
